game.name: Castle Crashers - Blacksmith Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Shrouded in mystery and in purple, the Blacksmith is ready to step out of legend and enter the fray. Hammer your opponents with this new playable character and 5 additional new weapons.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shrouded in mystery and in purple, the Blacksmith is ready to step out of legend and enter the fray. Hammer your opponents with this new playable character and 5 additional new weapons.
